title: Baklava Recipe
contents:
This recipe is a compilation of online recipes that was created by my mom, Laurel Boyajian, in an attempt to recreate the baklava from her childhood baked by her Armenian aunts.
Recipe modifications:  Vegan: you can easily make this recipe vegan by using a vegan butter - no other changes needed.  Sugar: you can cut down the total amount of sugar used to make a less sweet version or substitute honey instead of sugar.
Supplies:
Rectangular baking dish
Food processor
Pastry brush
Ingredients (filling, syrup, and dough):
Filo dough (usually found in the frozen section of the grocery store by the pie crusts)
6 Tbs rose water
() cups sugar
() cups water
() lbs raw nuts (I use a combination of 50% walnut, 25% hazelnut, and 25% pistachio)
() butter (melted)
Instructions:
Blend all of the nuts and () cups of the sugar until (), transfer to
Mix in () Tbsp of rose water
